global.openMenuA11y: Open menu. To close the menu press Escape

empty.heading: Welcome to Let's Chat With!
empty.text: The best way to get started is to join a conference. You can scan a QR Code or use the conference URL provided by the organizers using the button below. Check your email or the check-in desk for more information.

notification.title: Successful copy
notification.message: Share url is copied to your clipboard
notification.errorMessage: Share url could not be copied to your clipboard

modal.title: Join a conference
modal.description: To join your conference, look for the QR Code or conference URL. Organizers will typically email this to you before the conference starts. You can also ask another attendee to share the QR Code with you via the "Share" option. Alternatively, check the conference check-in desk for joining info.

byQR.error: An error occurred during QR Scan
byQR.allowCameraMessage: Camera access must be granted to scan QR codes

specialOffers.label: Subscribe for special tickets
specialOffers.description: Get special offers for related conference tickets save up to 75%

socials.title: Add social networks
socials.description: Your socials will be shown on your profile page. Make your profile more attractive.

uploadPhoto.title: Upload your photo
uploadPhoto.description: Snap a selfie or upload your favorite headshot. It doesn't have to be glamorous.

bio.title: Add your Bio
bio.description: Profiles with Bio attract more target connections.

lookingFor.title: What are you looking for?
lookingFor.description: Help us to find the best chatters for you.

whoIAm.title: Who are you?
whoIAm.description: Help us to find the best chatters for you.

connect.reviewChatterInterests: Review chatter interests to find networking opportunities that align with your interests. If the other chatter shows interest as well, we'll connect you to continue the conversation.
connect.notInterested: Not interested in connecting with someone? That's ok! You can pass and see other chatters to connect with.

messages.placeholderMessage: Say hi to start a conversation!

banner.interestedBecause: Chatter is interested in talking to you because

messages.firstMessage: Write the first message to start a conversation.

empty.title: Look at you!
empty.description: You've gone through all the connection suggestions, start chatting with your matches or check back soon

main.heading: Login to LetsChatWith

terms.empathyText: We all express ourselves differently. Do not judge.

currentEmail.enterEmail: Enter your email and we will send you a security code which allows you to change your password.
